page.title: 11Leisure Activities - 1
page.content: A prominent local leisure activity is{BMX}riding.BMX stands for Bicycle Motor Cross,the latest craze attracting children fortunate enough to have the Â£120+ needed to obtain a machine.The bike is very light and very strong,essential to withstand the shocks of jumping,and{stunt}riding. Children have made a track in Dorridge Wood where they gather to practise their{skills}of'wheelies','bunnyhops', 'horsey-kicks'and'endo's'. Races are organised spontaneously over rough terrain and keenly competed for victory.
